entry.title: Openstack Overview - Operational Details of a large Python Project
entry.summary:
Summary

[EuroPython 2012] Padraig Brady - 3 JULY 2012 in "Track Spaghetti"

Description

OpenStack is a large and relatively new platform for building IaaS public and private clouds, which has attracted widespread backing from many companies. Covered in the talk is: A summary of what OpenStack is trying to achieve An overview of the structure of OpenStack services Details of the multitude of python components used Deployment and Packaging information
